mainBoard.name: Divine Verdict
mainBoard.originalText: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.

rulings.text: A “blocking creature” is one that has been declared as a blocker this combat, or one that was put onto the battlefield blocking this combat. Unless that creature leaves combat, it continues to be a blocking creature through the end of combat step, even if the creature or creatures it was blocking are no longer on the battlefield or have otherwise left combat.

An “attacking creature” is one that has been declared as an attacker this combat, or one that was put onto the battlefield attacking this combat. Unless that creature leaves combat, it continues to be an attacking creature through the end of combat step, even if the player it was attacking has left the game, or the planeswalker it was attacking has left combat.
Destroying a blocking creature won't cause any of the creatures it was blocking to become unblocked. They won't deal combat damage to the defending player or planeswalker (unless they have trample).

mainBoard.text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.

foreignData.flavorText: Visita a los muertos y puede que ellos te devuelvan el favor.
foreignData.name: No olvidado
foreignData.text: Pon la carta objetivo de un cementerio en la parte superior o inferior de la biblioteca de su propietario. Crea una ficha de criatura Espíritu blanca 1/1 con la habilidad de volar.

foreignData.flavorText: Rendez visite aux morts et ils pourraient vous rendre la pareille.
foreignData.name: Jamais oublié
foreignData.text: Mettez une carte ciblée depuis un cimetière au-dessus ou au-dessous de la bibliothèque de son propriétaire. Créez un jeton de créature 1/1 blanche Esprit avec le vol.

foreignData.flavorText: Rendi visita ai morti e potrebbero ricambiare il favore.
foreignData.name: Mai Dimenticato
foreignData.text: Metti una carta bersaglio da un cimitero in cima o in fondo al grimorio del suo proprietario. Crea una pedina creatura Spirito 1/1 bianca con volare.

foreignData.flavorText: 死者を篤く弔えば、それに応えてくれるだろう。
foreignData.name: 忘られじ
foreignData.text: 墓地にあるカード１枚を対象とする。それをオーナーのライブラリーの一番上か一番下に置く。飛行を持つ白の１/１のスピリット・クリーチャー・トークン１体を生成する。

foreignData.flavorText: 前去凭吊死者，或会得其回访为报。
foreignData.name: 殁世不忘
foreignData.text: 将目标牌从坟墓场置于其拥有者的牌库顶或牌库底。派出一个1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。

mainBoard.name: Not Forgotten
mainBoard.originalText: Put target card from a graveyard on the top or bottom of its owner's library. Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

rulings.text: You choose whether to put the target card on the top or bottom of its owner’s library as Not Forgotten resolves.
You get the Spirit token, not the owner of the target card.

mainBoard.text: Put target card from a graveyard on your choice of the top or bottom of its owner's library. Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

foreignData.name: Ketten der Obhut
foreignData.text:
Verzaubert eine Kreatur, die du kontrollierst
Wenn die Ketten der Obhut ins Spiel kommen, schicke eine bleibende Karte deiner Wahl, die kein Land ist und die ein Gegner kontrolliert, ins Exil, bis die Ketten der Obhut das Spiel verlassen.
Die verzauberte Kreatur hat Abwehr {2}. (Immer wenn sie das Ziel eines Zauberspruchs oder einer Fähigkeit wird, den bzw. die ein Gegner kontrolliert, neutralisiere ihn bzw. sie, es sei denn, jener Spieler bezahlt {2}.)

foreignData.name: Cadenas de custodia
foreignData.text:
Encantar criatura que controlas.
Cuando las Cadenas de custodia entren al campo de batalla, exilia el permanente objetivo que no sea tierra que controla un oponente hasta que las Cadenas de custodia dejen el campo de batalla.
La criatura encantada tiene la habilidad de rebatir {2}. (Siempre que sea objetivo de un hechizo o habilidad que controla un oponente, contrarréstalo a menos que ese jugador pague {2}.)

foreignData.name: Chaînes de détention
foreignData.text:
Enchanter : une créature que vous contrôlez
Quand les Chaînes de détention arrivent sur le champ de bataille, exilez un permanent non-terrain ciblé qu'un adversaire contrôle jusqu'à ce que les Chaînes de détention quittent le champ de bataille.
La créature enchantée a parade {2}. (À chaque fois qu'elle devient la cible d'un sort ou d'une capacité qu'un adversaire contrôle, contrecarrez ce sort ou cette capacité à moins que ce joueur ne paie {2}.)

foreignData.name: Catene di Custodia
foreignData.text:
Incanta creatura che controlli
Quando le Catene di Custodia entrano nel campo di battaglia, esilia un permanente non terra bersaglio controllato da un avversario finché le Catene di Custodia non lasciano il campo di battaglia.
La creatura incantata ha egida {2}. (Ogniqualvolta diventa bersaglio di una magia o abilità controllata da un avversario, neutralizza quella magia o abilità a meno che quel giocatore non paghi {2}.)

foreignData.name: 拘束の鎖
foreignData.text:
エンチャント（あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャー）
拘束の鎖が戦場に出たとき、対戦相手がコントロールしていて土地でないパーマネント１つを対象とする。それを拘束の鎖が戦場を離れるまで追放する。
エンチャントしているクリーチャーは護法{2}を持つ。（それが対戦相手がコントロールしている呪文や能力の対象になるたび、そのプレイヤーが{2}を支払わないかぎり、その呪文や能力を打ち消す。）
foreignData.type: エンチャント — オーラ

foreignData.name: 监护锁链
foreignData.text:
结附于由你操控的生物
当监护锁链进战场时，放逐目标由对手操控的非地永久物，直到监护锁链离开战场为止。
所结附的生物具有守护{2}。（每当它成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标时，除非该牌手支付{2}，否则反击之。）

mainBoard.name: Chains of Custody
mainBoard.originalText:
Enchant creature you control
When Chains of Custody enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Chains of Custody leaves the battlefield.
Enchanted creature has ward {2}. (Whenever it becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)

rulings.text: Auras attached to the exiled permanent will be put into their owners' graveyards. Any Equipment will become unattached and remain on the battlefield. Any counters on the exiled permanent will cease to exist. When the card returns to the battlefield, it will be a new object with no connection to the card that was exiled.
If Chains of Custody leaves the battlefield before its second ability resolves, the target permanent won't be exiled.
If a token is exiled this way, it will cease to exist and won't return to the battlefield.

If an Aura is exiled this way, its owner chooses what it will enchant as it returns to the battlefield. An Aura put onto the battlefield this way doesn't target anything (so it could be attached to a permanent with shroud, for example), but the Aura's enchant ability restricts what it can be attached to. If the Aura can't legally be attached to anything, it remains in exile for the rest of the game.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant creature you control
When this Aura enters, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until this Aura leaves the battlefield.
Enchanted creature has ward {2}. (Whenever it becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)

mainBoard.flavorText: Wildflowers here bloom not with the season but with the ebb and flow of magic.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Blüte der Wildblumen richtet sich hier nicht nach den Jahreszeiten, sondern nach den Gezeiten der Magie.
foreignData.name: Gedeihende Heide
foreignData.text:
Die Gedeihende Heide kommt getappt ins Spiel.
Sowie die Gedeihende Heide ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe außer Weiß.
{T}: Erzeuge {W} oder ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText: Las flores salvajes de aquí no florecen según las estaciones, sino según los altibajos y el flujo de la magia.
foreignData.name: Brezal floreciente
foreignData.text:
El Brezal floreciente entra al campo de batalla girado.
En cuanto el Brezal floreciente entre al campo de batalla, elige un color que no sea blanco.
{T}: Agrega {W} o un maná del color elegido.

foreignData.flavorText: Ici, les fleurs sauvages s'épanouissent non pas au gré des saisons mais au gré des flux de magie.
foreignData.name: Prairie prospère
foreignData.text:
La Prairie prospère arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée.
Au moment où la Prairie prospère arrive sur le champ de bataille, choisissez une couleur autre que le blanc.
{T} : Ajoutez {W} ou un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText: I fiori selvatici qui non sbocciano in base alle stagioni, ma seguendo il fluire della magia.
foreignData.name: Brughiera Florida
foreignData.text:
La Brughiera Florida entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.
Mentre la Brughiera Florida entra nel campo di battaglia, scegli un colore diverso dal bianco.
{T}: Aggiungi {W} o un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText: 季節ではなく魔法の干満に従って野生の花が咲く。
foreignData.name: 興隆する荒野
foreignData.text:
興隆する荒野はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
興隆する荒野が戦場に出るに際し、白でない色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：{W}か、その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: 驱使这片野花绽放的，并非季节更替，而是魔力起伏。
foreignData.name: 兴旺荒地
foreignData.text:
兴旺荒地须横置进战场。
于兴旺荒地进战场时，选择一种白色以外的颜色。
{T}：加{W}或一点所选颜色的法术力。

mainBoard.name: Thriving Heath
mainBoard.originalText:
Thriving Heath enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Heath enters the battlefield, choose a color other than white.
{T}: Add {W} or one mana of the chosen color.
mainBoard.text:
This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than white.
{T}: Add {W} or one mana of the chosen color.
